phrs.headword: telecommunication equip we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao

sentences.sentence: The news gave a fillip to the telecommunications sector.
sentences.translation: 这个消息给电信部门注了一剂强心针。

sentences.sentence: The television screens of the next century will be linked up to an emerging world telecommunications grid.
sentences.translation: 下个世纪的电视屏幕将与一种新兴的世界电信网格相连。

sentences.sentence: Firstly, inventiveness has led to advances in printing, telecommunications, photography, radio and television.
sentences.translation: 首先，发明创造推动了印刷、电信、摄影、广播和电视的发展。
